meanings.definition: Having excessive ambition or desire for success.
meanings.sent1: She was overambitious in her goal to become the youngest CEO.
meanings.sent2: His overambitious nature led him to take on too many projects at once.
meanings.sent3: The overambitious squirrel tried to gather all the nuts in the park by itself.
meanings.sent4: Her overambitious dreams reached for the stars but often left her feeling overwhelmed.
meanings.sent5: The overambitious student aimed to finish all the homework in one night, but ended up exhausted.

meanings.definition: Characterized by excessive ambition or desire for success.
meanings.sent1: The overambitious plan to launch the product in just one week was risky.
meanings.sent2: Their overambitious strategy to expand globally backfired due to lack of resources.
meanings.sent3: The overambitious cat tried to catch all the birds in the garden but only managed to catch one.
meanings.sent4: The overambitious building project aimed to reach unprecedented heights in the city skyline.
meanings.sent5: His overambitious goals pushed him to work tirelessly, sometimes neglecting his health.
